name: Puzzle game for Kids and Toddlers 2 HD
name_original: Puzzle game for Kids and Toddlers 2 HD
description:
Play Free Games on:
http://www.myarcadegames.net

This puzzle game keeps your child busy for hours! Dive into the wonderful puzzles with Doc Mcstuffins, Umizoomi, Sofia the first and Hello Kitty with
HD graphics, colorful graphics, sounds and effect with balloons and stars! This app is great for kids and toddlers!

Features:
• - More then 10 puzzle levels, cute graphics and kids friendly sounds and effects
• - Very fun for childeren 2+
• - Enjoy clean graphics and precise game physics
• - Kids can push logical abilities to the limit
• - Effects with stars and balloons

Privacy Policy-
This app:
- Does not contain ads
- Does not contain links to social networks or any website
- Does not use data collection tools
